title: 《幸存者的秘密之书》已在美国出版
author: zx728925
txt_content:
本帖最后由 zx728925 于 2016-8-26 12:33 编辑 

Minecraft：The Survivors' Book of Secrets is coming out in the US today! Yay! http://mojang.com/2016/08/the-survivors-book-of-secrets-now-out-in-us/
Minecraft：这本《幸存者的秘密之书》今天在美国出版啦！耶！
